name: The Shadows Below
description:
How to Play:

Move with WASD;
Look with Mouse;
Left Click "Shoot" Light with energy gained by moving;
Right Click Send LightBall to Mouse Pos;

Goal: Destroy Enemy Spawners by Purifying them with light balls to Creat a hole  to jump down;

The deeper you go the darker it gets;

Jump off the first platform to Begin and Brave the Depths;

Entire Creation was streamed on Twitch https://www.twitch.tv/linkthesm/videos
